operation.name: listEventTypes
operation.description: Returns a list of Event Types (i.e. Sports) associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listCompetitions
operation.description: Returns a list of Competitions (i.e., World Cup 2013) associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter. Currently only Football markets have an associated competition.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listTimeRanges
operation.description: Returns a list of time ranges in the granularity specified in the request (i.e. 3PM to 4PM, Aug 14th to Aug 15th) associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: granularity
parameter.description: The granularity of time periods that correspond to markets selected by the market filter.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listEvents
operation.description: Returns a list of Events (i.e, Reading vs. Man United) associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listMarketTypes
operation.description: Returns a list of market types (i.e. MATCH_ODDS, NEXT_GOAL) associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter. The market types are always the same, regardless of locale.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listCountries
operation.description: Returns a list of Countries associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listVenues
operation.description: Returns a list of Venues (i.e. Cheltenham, Ascot) associated with the markets selected by the MarketFilter. Currently, only Horse Racing markets are associated with a Venue.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listMarketCatalogue
operation.description: Returns a list of information about markets that does not change (or changes very rarely). You use listMarketCatalogue to retrieve the name of the market, the names of selections and other information about markets.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The filter to select desired markets. All markets that match the criteria in the filter are selected.

parameter.name: marketProjection
parameter.description: The type and amount of data returned about the market.

parameter.name: sort
parameter.description: The order of the results. Will default to RANK if not passed

parameter.name: maxResults
parameter.description: limit on the total number of results returned, must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 1000

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listMarketBook
operation.description: Returns a list of dynamic data about markets. Dynamic data includes prices, the status of the market, the status of selections, the traded volume, and the status of any orders you have placed in the market.

parameter.name: marketIds
parameter.description: One or more market ids. The number of markets returned depends on the amount of data you request via the price projection.

parameter.name: priceProjection
parameter.description: The projection of price data you want to receive in the response.

parameter.name: orderProjection
parameter.description: The orders you want to receive in the response.

parameter.name: matchProjection
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, specifies the representation of matches.

parameter.name: includeOverallPosition
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, returns matches for each selection. Defaults to true if unspecified.

parameter.name: partitionMatchedByStrategyRef
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, returns the breakdown of matches by strategy for each selection. Groups matches with no strategy in an empty string bucket. Defaults to false if unspecified.

parameter.name: customerStrategyRefs
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, restricts the results to orders matching any of the specified set of customer defined strategies. Also filters which matches by strategy for runners are returned, if partitionMatchedByStrategyRef is true. An empty set will be treated as if the parameter has been omitted (or null passed).

parameter.name: currencyCode
parameter.description: A Betfair standard currency code. If not specified, the default currency code is used.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

parameter.name: matchedSince
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, restricts the results to orders that have at least one fragment matched since the specified date (all matched fragments of such an order will be returned even if some were matched before the specified date). All EXECUTABLE orders will be returned regardless of matched date.

parameter.name: betIds
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, restricts the results to orders with the specified bet IDs.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listRunnerBook
operation.description: Returns a list of dynamic data about a market and a specified runner. Dynamic data includes prices, the status of the market, the status of selections, the traded volume, and the status of any orders you have placed in the market.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The unique id for the market.

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The unique id for the selection in the market.

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: If specified, the handicap is used in conjunction with the selectionId to pick which runner to return prices for

parameter.name: priceProjection
parameter.description: The projection of price data you want to receive in the response.

parameter.name: orderProjection
parameter.description: The orders you want to receive in the response.

parameter.name: matchProjection
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, specifies the representation of matches.

parameter.name: includeOverallPosition
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, returns matches for each selection. Defaults to true if unspecified.

parameter.name: partitionMatchedByStrategyRef
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, returns the breakdown of matches by strategy for each selection. Groups matches with no strategy in an empty string bucket. Defaults to false if unspecified.

parameter.name: customerStrategyRefs
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, restricts the results to orders matching any of the specified set of customer defined strategies. Also filters which matches by strategy for runners are returned, if partitionMatchedByStrategyRef is true. An empty set will be treated as if the parameter has been omitted (or null passed).

parameter.name: currencyCode
parameter.description: A Betfair standard currency code. If not specified, the default currency code is used.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the response. If not specified, the default is returned.

parameter.name: matchedSince
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, restricts the results to orders that have at least one fragment matched since the specified date (all matched fragments of such an order will be returned even if some were matched before the specified date). All EXECUTABLE orders will be returned regardless of matched date.

parameter.name: betIds
parameter.description: If you ask for orders, restricts the results to orders with the specified bet IDs.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listCurrentOrders
operation.description: Returns a list of your current orders. Optionally you can filter and sort your current orders using the various parameters, setting none of the parameters will return all of your current orders, up to a maximum of 1000 bets, ordered BY_BET and sorted EARLIEST_TO_LATEST. To retrieve more than 1000 orders, you need to make use of the fromRecord and recordCount parameters.

parameter.name: betIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified bet IDs.

parameter.name: marketIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified market IDs.

parameter.name: orderProjection
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified order status.

parameter.name: customerOrderRefs
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified customer order references.

parameter.name: customerStrategyRefs
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified customer strategy references.

parameter.name: placedDateRange
parameter.description: @Deprecated use dateRange instead. Optionally restricts the results to be from/to the specified placed date. This date is inclusive, i.e. if an order was placed on exactly this date (to the millisecond) then it will be included in the results. If the from is later than the to, no results will be returned.

parameter.name: dateRange
parameter.description: Replacement for placedDateRange to allow filtering by other date fields rather than just placedDate. Optionally restricts the results to be from/to the specified date, these dates are contextual to the orders being returned and therefore the dates used to filter on will change to placed, matched, voided or settled dates depending on the orderBy. This date is inclusive, i.e. if an order was placed on exactly this date (to the millisecond) then it will be included in the results. If the from is later than the to, no results will be returned.

parameter.name: orderBy
parameter.description: Specifies how the results will be ordered. If no value is passed in, it defaults to BY_BET. Also acts as a filter such that only orders with a valid value in the field being ordered by will be returned (i.e. BY_VOID_TIME returns only voided orders, BY_SETTLED_TIME returns only settled orders and BY_MATCH_TIME returns only orders with a matched date (voided, settled, matched orders)).

parameter.name: sortDir
parameter.description: Specifies the direction the results will be sorted in. If no value is passed in, it defaults to EARLIEST_TO_LATEST.

parameter.name: fromRecord
parameter.description: Specifies the first record that will be returned. Records start at index zero, not at index one.

parameter.name: recordCount
parameter.description: Specifies how many records will be returned, from the index position 'fromRecord'. Note that there is a page size limit of 1000. A value of zero indicates that you would like all records (including and from 'fromRecord') up to the limit.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listClearedOrders
operation.description: Returns a List of bets based on the bet status, ordered by settled date

parameter.name: betStatus
parameter.description: Restricts the results to the specified status.

parameter.name: eventTypeIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified Event Type IDs.

parameter.name: eventIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified Event IDs.

parameter.name: marketIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified market IDs.

parameter.name: runnerIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified Runners.

parameter.name: betIds
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified bet IDs.

parameter.name: customerOrderRefs
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified customer order references.

parameter.name: customerStrategyRefs
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified customer strategy references.

parameter.name: side
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to the specified side.

parameter.name: settledDateRange
parameter.description: Optionally restricts the results to be from/to the specified settled date. This date is inclusive, i.e. if an order was placed on exactly this date (to the millisecond) then it will be included in the results. If the from is later than the to, no results will be returned.

parameter.name: groupBy
parameter.description: How to aggregate the lines, if not supplied then the lowest level is returned, i.e. bet by bet This is only applicable to SETTLED BetStatus.

parameter.name: includeItemDescription
parameter.description: If true then an ItemDescription object is included in the response.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language used for the itemDescription. If not specified, the customer account default is returned.

parameter.name: fromRecord
parameter.description: Specifies the first record that will be returned. Records start at index zero.

parameter.name: recordCount
parameter.description: Specifies how many records will be returned, from the index position 'fromRecord'. Note that there is a page size limit of 1000. A value of zero indicates that you would like all records (including and from 'fromRecord') up to the limit.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: placeOrders
operation.description: Place new orders into market. LIMIT orders below the minimum bet size are allowed if there is an unmatched bet at the same price in the market. This operation is atomic in that all orders will be placed or none will be placed.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The market id these orders are to be placed on

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Optional parameter allowing the client to pass a unique string (up to 32 chars) that is used to de-dupe mistaken re-submissions.

parameter.name: marketVersion
parameter.description: Optional parameter allowing the client to specify which version of the market the orders should be placed on. If the current market version is higher than that sent on an order, the bet will be lapsed. Useful when a customer doesn't want to bet in play and is worried that their bet might arrive after the market has turned in play.

parameter.name: customerStrategyRef
parameter.description: An optional reference customers can use to specify which strategy has sent the order. The reference will be returned on order change messages through the stream API. The string is limited to 15 characters. If an empty string is provided it will be treated as null.

parameter.name: async
parameter.description: An optional flag (not setting equates to false) which specifies if the orders should be placed asynchronously. Orders can be tracked via the Exchange Stream API or or the API-NG by providing a customerOrderRef for each place order. An order's status will be PENDING and no bet ID will be returned. This functionality is available for all bet types - including MOC and LOC.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: cancelOrders
operation.description: Cancel all bets OR cancel all bets on a market OR fully or partially cancel particular orders on a market. Only LIMIT orders an be cancelled or partially cancelled once placed.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: If not supplied all bets are cancelled

parameter.name: instructions
parameter.description: All instructions need to be on the same market. If not supplied all bets on the market (if market id is passed) are fully cancelled

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Optional parameter allowing the client to pass a unique string (upto 32 chars) that is used to de-dupe mistaken re-submitions.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: replaceOrders
operation.description: This operation is logically a bulk cancel followed by a bulk place. The cancel is completed first then the new orders are placed. The new orders will be placed atomically in that they will all be placed or none will be placed. In the case where the new orders cannot be placed the cancellations will not be rolled back. See ReplaceInstruction.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The market id these orders are to be placed on

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Optional parameter allowing the client to pass a unique string (up to 32 chars) that is used to de-dupe mistaken re-submissions.

parameter.name: marketVersion
parameter.description: Optional parameter allowing the client to specify which version of the market the orders should be placed on. Useful when a customer doesn't want to bet in play and is worried that their bet might arrive after the market has turned in play.

parameter.name: async
parameter.description: An optional flag (not setting equates to false) which specifies if the orders should be replaced asynchronously. Orders can be tracked via the Exchange Stream API or the API-NG by providing a customerOrderRef for each replace order. Not available for MOC or LOC bets.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: updateOrders
operation.description: Update non-exposure changing fields

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The market id these orders are to be placed on

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Optional parameter allowing the client to pass a unique string (up to 32 chars) that is used to de-dupe mistaken re-submissions.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listMarketProfitAndLoss
operation.description: Retrieve profit and loss for a given list of markets. The values are calculated using matched bets and optionally settled bets. Only odds markets are implemented, markets of other types are silently ignored.

parameter.name: marketIds
parameter.description: List of markets to calculate profit and loss

parameter.name: includeSettledBets
parameter.description: Option to include settled bets (partially settled markets only). Defaults to false if not specified.

parameter.name: includeBspBets
parameter.description: Option to include BSP bets. Defaults to false if not specified.

parameter.name: netOfCommission
parameter.description: Option to return profit and loss net of users current commission rate for this market including any special tariffs. Defaults to false if not specified.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: setDefaultExposureLimitForMarketGroups
operation.description: Create/update default exposure limit for market groups of given type. New value and breach action will be immediately applied to existing instances of this type (unless overridden using setExposureLimitForMarketGroup). If default values are overridden for market groups (using setExposureLimitForMarketGroup), overrides will NOT be touched. In order to clear this limit "removeDefaultExposureLimitForMarketGroups" operation should be used. It's not allowed to set default limit to an empty limit (see type ExposureLimit).

parameter.name: marketGroupType
parameter.description: Market group type

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Default exposure limit and action

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: setExposureLimitForMarketGroup
operation.description: Create/update exposure limit for a market group. New limit will be applied immediately (even if a default limit exists for this type). The limit will be deleted upon account action (see deleteMarketGroupExposureLimit) or when no active markets remain under market group. It is possible to "invalidate" default limit for a specific group by using a "empty" limit (see type ExposureLimit). Upon successful execution of the request, the effective limit for this group will be the one set by this request (Properties will NOT be inherited from default limit).

parameter.name: marketGroup
parameter.description: Market group

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Exposure limit

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: removeDefaultExposureLimitForMarketGroups
operation.description: Remove default exposure limit for a market group type. This operation will NOT remove/update any market group limits.

parameter.name: marketGroupType
parameter.description: Market group type

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: removeExposureLimitForMarketGroup
operation.description: Delete exposure limit for a market group. If a default exposure limit exist for market type, it takes effect immediately.

parameter.name: marketGroup
parameter.description: Market group

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listExposureLimitsForMarketGroups
operation.description: Response to this request returns default group limit and group limits grouped by type. If marketGroupTypeFilter is not populated values for all types are returned. The response will always contain the default limit. It is possible to control which groups to return using marketGroupsFilter parameter. If marketGroupsFilter is not set all group limits are returned. If an emtpy list is passed only default limit(s) is returned. When marketGroupTypeFilter and marketGroupsFilter used together, all groups in marketGroupsFilter are required to be of same type (type used in marketGroupTypeFilter).

parameter.name: marketGroupTypeFilter
parameter.description: Optionally filter results by market group type.

parameter.name: marketGroupFilter
parameter.description: Optionally filter result by market groups.

simpleResponse.description: Exposure limits grouped by market group type

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: unblockMarketGroup
operation.description: Unblock a market group after it has been blocked due to the breach of a previously set exposure limit.

parameter.name: marketGroup
parameter.description: Market group to unblock

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getExposureReuseEnabledEvents
operation.description: Retrieves events from exposure reuse enabled events list. To edit this list use addExposureReuseEnabledEvents and removeExposureReuseEnabledEvents operations.

simpleResponse.description: List of events enabled for exposure reuse

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: addExposureReuseEnabledEvents
operation.description: Enables events for exposure reuse by appending them to the current list of events already enabled.

parameter.name: eventIds
parameter.description: List of event ids to remove.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: removeExposureReuseEnabledEvents
operation.description: Removes events from exposure reuse enabled events list.

parameter.name: eventIds
parameter.description: List of event ids to remove.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

parameter.name: textQuery
parameter.description: Restrict markets by any text associated with the market such as the Name, Event, Competition, etc. You can include a wildcard (*) character as long as it is not the first character.

parameter.name: exchangeIds
parameter.description: Restrict markets by the Exchange where the market operates. Note: This is not currently in use and only entities for the current exchange will be returned.

parameter.name: eventTypeIds
parameter.description: Restrict markets by event type associated with the market. (i.e., Football, Hockey, etc)

parameter.name: eventIds
parameter.description: Restrict markets by the event id associated with the market.

parameter.name: competitionIds
parameter.description: Restrict markets by the competitions associated with the market.

parameter.name: marketIds
parameter.description: Restrict markets by the market id associated with the market.

parameter.name: venues
parameter.description: Restrict markets by the venue associated with the market. Currently only Horse Racing markets have venues.

parameter.name: bspOnly
parameter.description: Restrict to bsp markets only, if True or non-bsp markets if False. If not specified then returns both BSP and non-BSP markets

parameter.name: turnInPlayEnabled
parameter.description: Restrict to markets that will turn in play if True or will not turn in play if false. If not specified, returns both.

parameter.name: inPlayOnly
parameter.description: Restrict to markets that will turn in play if True or will not turn in play if false. If not specified, returns both.

parameter.name: marketBettingTypes
parameter.description: Restrict to markets that match the betting type of the market (i.e. Odds, Asian Handicap Singles, Asian Handicap Doubles or Line)

parameter.name: marketCountries
parameter.description: Restrict to markets that are in the specified country or countries

parameter.name: marketTypeCodes
parameter.description: Restrict to markets that match the type of the market (i.e., MATCH_ODDS, HALF_TIME_SCORE). You should use this instead of relying on the market name as the market type codes are the same in all locales

parameter.name: marketStartTime
parameter.description: Restrict to markets with a market start time before or after the specified date

parameter.name: withOrders
parameter.description: Restrict to markets that I have one or more orders in these status.

parameter.name: raceTypes
parameter.description: Restrict by race type

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The unique identifier for the market

parameter.name: marketName
parameter.description: The name of the market

parameter.name: marketStartTime
parameter.description: The time this market starts at, only returned when the MARKET_START_TIME enum is passed in the marketProjections

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Details about the market

parameter.name: totalMatched
parameter.description: The total amount of money matched on the market. This value is truncated at 2dp.

parameter.name: runners
parameter.description: The runners (selections) contained in the market

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.description: The Event Type the market is contained within

parameter.name: competition
parameter.description: The competition the market is contained within. Usually only applies to Football competitions

parameter.name: event
parameter.description: The event the market is contained within

dataType.name: MarketBook
dataType.description: The dynamic data in a market

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The unique identifier for the market

parameter.name: isMarketDataDelayed
parameter.description: True if the data returned by listMarketBook will be delayed. The data may be delayed because you are not logged in with a funded account or you are using an Application Key that does not allow up to date data.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status of the market, for example ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, SETTLED, etc.

parameter.name: betDelay
parameter.description: The number of seconds an order is held until it is submitted into the market. Orders are usually delayed when the market is in-play

parameter.name: bspReconciled
parameter.description: True if the market starting price has been reconciled

parameter.name: inplay
parameter.description: True if the market is currently in play

parameter.name: numberOfWinners
parameter.description: The number of selections that could be settled as winners

parameter.name: numberOfRunners
parameter.description: The number of runners in the market

parameter.name: numberOfActiveRunners
parameter.description: The number of runners that are currently active. An active runner is a selection available for betting

parameter.name: lastMatchTime
parameter.description: The most recent time an order was executed

parameter.name: totalMatched
parameter.description: The total amount matched. This value is truncated at 2dp.

parameter.name: totalAvailable
parameter.description: The total amount of orders that remain unmatched. This value is truncated at 2dp.

parameter.name: crossMatching
parameter.description: True if cross matching is enabled for this market.

parameter.name: runnersVoidable
parameter.description: True if runners in the market can be voided

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: The version of the market. The version increments whenever the market status changes, for example, turning in-play, or suspended when a goal score.

parameter.name: runners
parameter.description: Information about the runners (selections) in the market.

parameter.name: keyLineDescription
parameter.description: Description of a markets key line for valid market types

dataType.name: RunnerCatalog
dataType.description: Information about the Runners (selections) in a market

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The unique id for the selection.

parameter.name: runnerName
parameter.description: The name of the runner

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: The handicap

parameter.name: sortPriority
parameter.description: The sort priority of this runner

parameter.name: metadata
parameter.description: Metadata associated with the runner

dataType.name: Runner
dataType.description: The dynamic data about runners in a market

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The unique id of the runner (selection)

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: The handicap

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status of the selection (i.e., ACTIVE, REMOVED, WINNER, LOSER)

parameter.name: adjustmentFactor
parameter.description: The adjustment factor applied if the selection is removed

parameter.name: lastPriceTraded
parameter.description: The price of the most recent bet matched on this selection

parameter.name: totalMatched
parameter.description: The total amount matched on this runner. This value is truncated at 2dp.

parameter.name: removalDate
parameter.description: If date and time the runner was removed

parameter.name: sp
parameter.description: The BSP related prices for this runner

parameter.name: ex
parameter.description: The Exchange prices available for this runner

parameter.name: orders
parameter.description: List of orders in the market

parameter.name: matches
parameter.description: List of matches (i.e, orders that have been fully or partially executed)

parameter.name: matchesByStrategy
parameter.description: List of matches keyed by strategy, ordered by matched data

dataType.name: StartingPrices
dataType.description: Information about the Betfair Starting Price. Only available in BSP markets

parameter.name: nearPrice
parameter.description: What the starting price would be if the market was reconciled now taking into account the SP bets as well as unmatched exchange bets on the same selection in the exchange.

parameter.name: farPrice
parameter.description: What the starting price would be if the market was reconciled now taking into account only the currently place SP bets. The Far Price is not as complicated but not as accurate and only accounts for money on the exchange at SP.

parameter.name: actualSP
parameter.description: The final BSP price for this runner. Only available for a BSP market that has been reconciled.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The unique id for the event

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name of the event

parameter.name: countryCode
parameter.description: countryCode

parameter.name: timezone
parameter.description: timezone

parameter.name: venue
parameter.description: venue

parameter.name: openDate
parameter.description: openDate

parameter.name: event
parameter.description: Event

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this event

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: id

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: name

parameter.name: competition
parameter.description: Competition

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this competition

parameter.name: competitionRegion
parameter.description: Region in which this competition is happening

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: id

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: name

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.description: EventType

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this eventType

parameter.name: marketType
parameter.description: Market Type

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this marketType

parameter.name: countryCode
parameter.description: Country Code

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this Country Code

parameter.name: venue
parameter.description: Venue

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this Venue

parameter.name: from
parameter.description: from, format: ISO 8601)

parameter.name: to
parameter.description: to, format: ISO 8601

parameter.name: timeRange
parameter.description: TimeRange

parameter.name: marketCount
parameter.description: Count of markets associated with this TimeRange

parameter.name: orderType
parameter.description: BSP Order type.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Either EXECUTABLE (an unmatched amount remains) or EXECUTION_COMPLETE (no unmatched amount remains).

parameter.name: persistenceType
parameter.description: What to do with the order at turn-in-play

parameter.name: price
parameter.description: The price of the bet.

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: The size of the bet.

parameter.name: bspLiability
parameter.description: Not to be confused with size. This is the liability of a given BSP bet.

parameter.name: placedDate
parameter.description: The date, to the second, the bet was placed.

parameter.name: avgPriceMatched
parameter.description: The average price matched at. Voided match fragments are removed from this average calculation. This value is not meaningful for activity on LINE markets and is not guaranteed to be returned or maintained for these markets.

parameter.name: sizeMatched
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was matched.

parameter.name: sizeRemaining
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that is unmatched.

parameter.name: sizeLapsed
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was lapsed.

parameter.name: sizeCancelled
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was cancelled.

parameter.name: sizeVoided
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was voided.

parameter.name: customerOrderRef
parameter.description: The customer order reference sent for this bet

parameter.name: customerStrategyRef
parameter.description: The customer strategy reference sent for this bet

parameter.name: matches
parameter.description: List of matches

dataType.name: Match
dataType.description: An individual bet Match, or rollup by price or avg price. Rollup depends on the requested MatchProjection

parameter.name: betId
parameter.description: Only present if no rollup

parameter.name: matchId
parameter.description: Only present if no rollup

parameter.name: price
parameter.description: Either actual match price or avg match price depending on rollup. This value is not meaningful for activity on LINE markets and is not guaranteed to be returned or maintained for these markets.

parameter.name: Size
parameter.description: Size matched at in this fragment, or at this price or avg price depending on rollup

parameter.name: matchDate
parameter.description: Only present if no rollup

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: marketStatus

parameter.name: betDelay

parameter.name: bspReconciled
parameter.description: bspReconciled

parameter.name: complete

parameter.name: inplay
