parameter.name: numberOfActiveRunners
parameter.description: numberActiveOfRunners

parameter.name: lastMatchTime
parameter.description: lastMatchTime

parameter.name: totalAvailable
parameter.description: Zero for closed markets

parameter.name: keyLineDescription
parameter.description: Description of a markets key line for valid market types

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: A non-monotonically increasing number indicating market changes

parameter.name: persistenceEnabled
parameter.description: persistenceMarket

parameter.name: bspMarket
parameter.description: bspMarket

parameter.name: marketTime
parameter.description: marketTime

parameter.name: suspendTime
parameter.description: marketSuspendTime

parameter.name: settleTime
parameter.description: settled time

parameter.name: bettingType
parameter.description: bettingType

parameter.name: turnInPlayEnabled
parameter.description: canTurnInPlay

parameter.name: marketType
parameter.description: market base type

parameter.name: regulator
parameter.description: the market regulator

parameter.name: eachWayDivisor
parameter.description: Each Way Divisor for E/W markets

parameter.name: lineRangeInfo
parameter.description: Line range info for Line markets and some variants of Handicap markets

parameter.name: raceType
parameter.description: An external identifier of a race type

parameter.name: priceLadderDescription
parameter.description: Details about the price ladder in use for this market.

parameter.name: marketBaseRate
parameter.description: marketBaseRate

parameter.name: discountAllowed
parameter.description: discountAllowed

parameter.name: wallet
parameter.description: The wallet from which funds will be taken when betting on this market

parameter.name: rules
parameter.description: The rules for this market

parameter.name: rulesHasDate
parameter.description: The market's start date and time are relevant to the rules.

parameter.name: clarifications
parameter.description: Clarifications to the rules for the market

parameter.name: maxUnitValue
parameter.description: Maximum value for the outcome, in market units for this market (eg 100 runs)

parameter.name: minUnitValue
parameter.description: Minimum value for the outcome, in market units for this market (eg 0 runs)

parameter.name: interval
parameter.description: . For Handicap and Line markets, the lines available on this market will be between the range of minUnitValue and maxUnitValue, in increments of the interval value. e.g. If marketUnit is runs, minUnitValue=10, maxUnitValue=20 and interval=0.5, then valid lines include 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5 up to 20 runs.

parameter.name: marketUnit
parameter.description: The type of unit the lines are incremented in by the interval (e.g: runs, goals or seconds)

parameter.name: currentOrders
parameter.description: The list of current orders returned by your query. This will be a valid list (i.e. empty or non-empty but never 'null').

parameter.name: moreAvailable
parameter.description: Indicates whether there are further result items beyond this page. Note that underlying data is highly time-dependent and the subsequent search orders query might return an empty result.

parameter.name: betId
parameter.description: The bet ID of the original place order.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The market id the order is for.

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The selection id the order is for.

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: The handicap of the bet.

parameter.name: priceSize
parameter.description: The price and size of the bet.

parameter.name: bspLiability
parameter.description: Not to be confused with size. This is the liability of a given BSP bet.

parameter.name: side
parameter.description: BACK/LAY

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Either EXECUTABLE (an unmatched amount remains) or EXECUTION_COMPLETE (no unmatched amount remains).

parameter.name: persistenceType
parameter.description: What to do with the order at turn-in-play.

parameter.name: orderType
parameter.description: BSP Order type.

parameter.name: placedDate
parameter.description: The date, to the second, the bet was placed.

parameter.name: matchedDate
parameter.description: The date, to the second, of the last matched bet fragment (where applicable).

parameter.name: averagePriceMatched
parameter.description: The average price matched at. Voided match fragments are removed from this average calculation. This value is not meaningful for activity on LINE markets and is not guaranteed to be returned or maintained for these markets.

parameter.name: sizeMatched
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was matched.

parameter.name: sizeRemaining
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that is unmatched.

parameter.name: sizeLapsed
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was lapsed.

parameter.name: sizeCancelled
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was cancelled.

parameter.name: sizeVoided
parameter.description: The current amount of this bet that was voided.

parameter.name: regulatorAuthCode
parameter.description: The regulator authorisation code.

parameter.name: regulatorCode
parameter.description: The regulator Code.

parameter.name: customerOrderRef
parameter.description: The order reference defined by the customer for this bet

parameter.name: customerStrategyRef
parameter.description: The strategy reference defined by the customer for this bet

parameter.name: eventTypeId
parameter.description: The id of the event type bet on. Available at EVENT_TYPE groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: eventId
parameter.description: The id of the event bet on. Available at EVENT groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The id of the market bet on. Available at MARKET groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The id of the selection bet on. Available at RUNNER groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: The id of the market bet on. Available at MARKET groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: betId
parameter.description: The id of the bet. Available at BET groupBy level.

parameter.name: placedDate
parameter.description: The date the bet order was placed by the customer. Only available at BET groupBy level.

parameter.name: persistenceType
parameter.description: The turn in play persistence state of the order at bet placement time. This field will be empty or omitted on true SP bets. Only available at BET groupBy level.

parameter.name: orderType
parameter.description: The type of bet (e.g standard limited-liability Exchange bet (LIMIT), a standard BSP bet (MARKET_ON_CLOSE), or a minimum-accepted-price BSP bet (LIMIT_ON_CLOSE)). If the bet has a OrderType of MARKET_ON_CLOSE and a persistenceType of MARKET_ON_CLOSE then it is a bet which has transitioned from LIMIT to MARKET_ON_CLOSE. Only available at BET groupBy level.

parameter.name: side
parameter.description: Whether the bet was a back or lay bet. Available at SIDE groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: itemDescription
parameter.description: A container for all the anciliary data and localised text valid for this Item

parameter.name: betOutcome
parameter.description: The settlement outcome of the bet. Tri-state (WIN/LOSE/PLACE) to account for Each Way bets where the place portion of the bet won but the win portion lost. The profit/loss amount in this case could be positive or negative depending on the price matched at. Only available at BET groupBy level.

parameter.name: priceRequested
parameter.description: The average requested price across all settled bet orders under this Item. Available at SIDE groupBy level or lower. For Line markets this is the line position requested.

parameter.name: settledDate
parameter.description: The date and time the bet order was settled by Betfair. Available at SIDE groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: lastMatchedDate
parameter.description: The date and time the last bet order was matched by Betfair. Available on Settled orders only.

parameter.name: betCount
parameter.description: The number of actual bets within this grouping (will be 1 for BET groupBy)

parameter.name: commission
parameter.description: The cumulative amount of commission paid by the customer across all bets under this Item, in the account currency. Available at EXCHANGE, EVENT_TYPE, EVENT and MARKET level groupings only.

parameter.name: priceMatched
parameter.description: The average matched price across all settled bets or bet fragments under this Item. Available at SIDE groupBy level or lower. This value is not meaningful for activity on LINE markets and is not guaranteed to be returned or maintained for these markets.

parameter.name: priceReduced
parameter.description: If true, then the matched price was affected by a reduction factor due to of a runner removal from this Horse Racing market.

parameter.name: sizeSettled
parameter.description: The cumulative bet size that was settled as matched or voided under this Item, in the account currency. Available at SIDE groupBy level or lower.

parameter.name: profit
parameter.description: The profit or loss (negative profit) gained on this line, in the account currency

parameter.name: sizeCancelled
parameter.description: The amount of the bet that was available to be matched, before cancellation or lapsing, in the account currency

parameter.name: customerOrderRef
parameter.description: The order reference defined by the customer for the bet order

parameter.name: customerStrategyRef
parameter.description: The strategy reference defined by the customer for the bet order

parameter.name: clearedOrders
parameter.description: The list of cleared orders returned by your query. This will be a valid list (i.e. empty or non-empty but never 'null').

parameter.name: moreAvailable
parameter.description: Indicates whether there are further result items beyond this page. Note that underlying data is highly time-dependent and the subsequent search orders query might return an empty result.

dataType.name: ItemDescription
dataType.description: This object contains some text which may be useful to render a betting history view. It offers no long-term warranty as to the correctness of the text.

parameter.name: eventTypeDesc
parameter.description: The event type name, translated into the requested locale. Available at EVENT_TYPE groupBy or lower.

parameter.name: eventDesc
parameter.description: The eventName, or openDate + venue, translated into the requested locale. Available at EVENT groupBy or lower.

parameter.name: marketDesc
parameter.description: The market name or racing market type ("Win", "To Be Placed (2 places)", "To Be Placed (5 places)" etc) translated into the requested locale. Available at MARKET groupBy or lower.

parameter.name: marketType
parameter.description: The market type

parameter.name: marketStartTime
parameter.description: The start time of the market (in ISO-8601 format, not translated). Available at MARKET groupBy or lower.

parameter.name: runnerDesc
parameter.description: The runner name, maybe including the handicap, translated into the requested locale. Available at BET groupBy.

parameter.name: numberOfWinners
parameter.description: The numberOfWinners on a market. Available at BET groupBy.

parameter.name: eachWayDivisor
parameter.description: The odds divisor applicable to EachWay markets

dataType.name: RunnerId
dataType.description: This object contains the unique identifier for a runner

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The id of the market bet on

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The id of the selection bet on

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: The handicap associated with the runner in case of asian handicap markets, null otherwise.

dataType.name: PlaceInstruction
dataType.description: Instruction to place a new order

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The selection_id.

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: The handicap applied to the selection, if on an asian-style market.

parameter.name: side
parameter.description: Back or Lay

parameter.name: customerOrderRef
parameter.description: An optional reference the customer can set to identify instructions and it will be returned on order change messages via the stream API. No validation will be done on uniqueness and the string is limited to 32 characters. If an empty string is provided it will be treated as null.

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Echo of the customerRef if passed.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: Echo of marketId passed

dataType.name: LimitOrder
dataType.description: Place a new LIMIT order (simple exchange bet for immediate execution)

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: The size of the bet. It is illegal to specify size if BetTargetType is specified.

parameter.name: price
parameter.description: The limit price. For LINE markets, the price at which the bet is settled and struck will always be 2.0 (Evens). On these bets, the Price field is used to indicate the line value which is being bought or sold.

parameter.name: persistenceType
parameter.description: What to do with the order at turn-in-play If no PersistenceType and TimeInForce value is specified, a PersistenceType of LAPSE will be used.

parameter.name: timeInForce
parameter.description: The type of TimeInForce value to use. This value takes precedence over any PersistenceType value chosen. If this attribute is populated along with the PersistenceType field, then the PersistenceType will be ignored. TimeInForce bets are valid for LINE markets however Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP) functionality is disabled.

parameter.name: minFillSize
parameter.description: An optional field used if the TimeInForce attribute is populated. If specified without TimeInForce then this field is ignored. If no minFillSize is specified, the order is killed unless the entire size can be matched. If minFillSize is specified, the order is killed unless at least the minFillSize can be matched. The minFillSize cannot be greater than the order's size. If specified for a BetTargetType and FILL_OR_KILL order, then this value will be ignored

parameter.name: betTargetType
parameter.description: An optional field to allow betting to a targeted PAYOUT or BACKERS_PROFIT. It is illegal to specify both a Size and BetTargetType For line markets, BetTargetType bets are invalid. Matching provides best execution at the requested price or better up to the payout or profit. If the bet is not matched completely and immediately, the remaining portion enters the unmatched pool of bets on the exchange

parameter.name: betTargetSize
parameter.description: An optional field which must be specified if BetTargetType is specified for this order The requested outcome size of either the payout or profit. This is named from the backer's perspective. For Lay bets the profit represents the bet's liability

parameter.name: liability
parameter.description: The size of the bet.

parameter.name: price
parameter.description: The limit price of the bet if LOC

parameter.name: liability
parameter.description: The size of the bet.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: whether the command succeeded or failed

parameter.name: errorCode
parameter.description: cause of failure, or null if command succeeds

parameter.name: orderStatus
parameter.description: The status of the order, if the instruction succeeded. If the instruction was unsuccessful, no value is provided.

parameter.name: instruction
parameter.description: The instruction that was requested

parameter.name: betId
parameter.description: The bet ID of the new bet. Will be null on failure or if order was placed asynchronously.

parameter.name: placedDate
parameter.description: Will be null if order was placed asynchronously

parameter.name: averagePriceMatched
parameter.description: Will be null if order was placed asynchronously. This value is not meaningful for activity on LINE markets and is not guaranteed to be returned or maintained for these markets.

parameter.name: sizeMatched
parameter.description: Will be null if order was placed asynchronously

dataType.name: CancelInstruction
dataType.description: Instruction to fully or partially cancel an order (only applies to LIMIT orders)

parameter.name: sizeReduction
parameter.description: If supplied then this is a partial cancel

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Echo of the customerRef if passed.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: Echo of marketId passed

dataType.name: ReplaceInstruction
dataType.description: Instruction to replace a LIMIT or LIMIT_ON_CLOSE order at a new price. Original order will be cancelled and a new order placed at the new price for the remaining stake.

parameter.name: newPrice
parameter.description: The price to replace the bet at

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Echo of the customerRef if passed.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: Echo of marketId passed

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: whether the command succeeded or failed

parameter.name: errorCode
parameter.description: cause of failure, or null if command succeeds

parameter.name: cancelInstructionReport
parameter.description: Cancelation report for the original order

parameter.name: placeInstructionReport
parameter.description: Placement report for the new order

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: whether the command succeeded or failed

parameter.name: errorCode
parameter.description: cause of failure, or null if command succeeds

parameter.name: instruction
parameter.description: The instruction that was requested

dataType.name: UpdateInstruction
dataType.description: Instruction to update LIMIT bet's persistence of an order that do not affect exposure

parameter.name: newPersistenceType
parameter.description: The new persistence type to update this bet to

parameter.name: customerRef
parameter.description: Echo of the customerRef if passed.

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: Echo of marketId passed

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: whether the command succeeded or failed

parameter.name: errorCode
parameter.description: cause of failure, or null if command succeeds

parameter.name: instruction
parameter.description: The instruction that was requested

dataType.name: PriceProjection
dataType.description: Selection criteria of the returning price data

parameter.name: priceData
parameter.description: The basic price data you want to receive in the response.

parameter.name: exBestOffersOverrides
parameter.description: Options to alter the default representation of best offer prices Applicable to EX_BEST_OFFERS priceData selection

parameter.name: virtualise
parameter.description: Indicates if the returned prices should include virtual prices. Applicable to EX_BEST_OFFERS and EX_ALL_OFFERS priceData selections, default value is false.

parameter.name: rolloverStakes
parameter.description: Indicates if the volume returned at each price point should be the absolute value or a cumulative sum of volumes available at the price and all better prices. If unspecified defaults to false. Applicable to EX_BEST_OFFERS and EX_ALL_OFFERS price projections. Not supported as yet.

dataType.name: ExBestOffersOverrides
dataType.description: Options to alter the default representation of best offer prices

parameter.name: bestPricesDepth
parameter.description: The maximum number of prices to return on each side for each runner. If unspecified defaults to 3.

parameter.name: rollupModel
parameter.description: The model to use when rolling up available sizes. If unspecified defaults to STAKE rollup model with rollupLimit of minimum stake in the specified currency.

parameter.name: rollupLimit
parameter.description: The volume limit to use when rolling up returned sizes. The exact definition of the limit depends on the rollupModel. If no limit is provided it will use minimum stake as default the value. Ignored if no rollup model is specified.

parameter.name: rollupLiabilityThreshold
parameter.description: Only applicable when rollupModel is MANAGED_LIABILITY. The rollup model switches from being stake based to liability based at the smallest lay price which is >= rollupLiabilityThreshold.service level default (TBD). Not supported as yet.

parameter.name: rollupLiabilityFactor
parameter.description: Only applicable when rollupModel is MANAGED_LIABILITY. (rollupLiabilityFactor * rollupLimit) is the minimum liabilty the user is deemed to be comfortable with. After the rollupLiabilityThreshold price subsequent volumes will be rolled up to minimum value such that the liability >= the minimum liability.service level default (5). Not supported as yet.

dataType.name: MarketProfitAndLoss
dataType.description: Profit and loss in a market

parameter.name: marketId
parameter.description: The unique identifier for the market

parameter.name: commissionApplied
parameter.description: The commission rate applied to P&L values. Only returned if netOfCommision option is requested

parameter.name: profitAndLosses
parameter.description: Calculated profit and loss data.

dataType.name: RunnerProfitAndLoss
dataType.description: Profit and loss if selection is wins or loses

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: The unique identifier for the selection

parameter.name: ifWin
parameter.description: Profit and loss for the market if this selection is the winner

parameter.name: ifLose
parameter.description: Profit and loss for the market if this selection is the loser. Only returned for multi-winner odds markets.

parameter.name: ifPlace
parameter.description: Profit and loss for the market if this selection is placed. Only returned for EACH_WAY markets.

dataType.name: PriceLadderDescription
dataType.description: Description of the price ladder type and any related data.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The type of price ladder.

dataType.name: KeyLineSelection
dataType.description: Description of a markets key line selection, comprising the selectionId and handicap of the team it is applied to.

parameter.name: selectionId
parameter.description: Selection ID of the runner in the key line handicap.

parameter.name: handicap
parameter.description: Handicap value of the key line.

dataType.name: KeyLineDescription
dataType.description: A list of KeyLineSelection objects describing the key line for the market

parameter.name: keyLine
parameter.description: A list of KeyLineSelection objects

dataType.name: ExposureLimitsForMarketGroups
dataType.description: Wrapper type that contains accounts exposure limits for a market group type. If default limit exists for group type, defaultLimit value will be populated. Group limits to return can be controller by marketGroupFilter parameter (see listExposureLimitsForMarketGroups operation).

parameter.name: marketGroupType
parameter.description: Market Group Type

parameter.name: defaultLimit
parameter.description: Default limit (if exists)

parameter.name: groupLimits
parameter.description: Group limits for type

parameter.name: blockedMarketGroups
parameter.description: Blocked groups due to limit breach

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Type of the group

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: ID of the group

dataType.name: MarketGroupId
dataType.description: Container type for market group ID

parameter.name: eventId
parameter.description: EventId (if type is EVENT)

dataType.name: LimitBreachAction
dataType.description: Action that should be execute when limit is breached

parameter.name: actionType
parameter.description: Type of the action

dataType.name: MarketGroupExposureLimit
dataType.description: Container type for a group exposure limit

parameter.name: groupId
parameter.description: Market group ID

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Exposure limit

dataType.name: ExposureLimit
dataType.description:
Exposure limit and limit breach action. Not populating one of total or matched parameters indicates that no limit should be set for that exposure value.
A special use of this type is when none of its parameters are populated, this can be used to override default limit to "no limit" for a specific instance of market group (see setExposureLimitForMarketGroup operation)

parameter.name: matched
parameter.description: Set a limit on matched bet exposure on market group

parameter.name: total
parameter.description: Set a limit on total (matched + unmatched) bet exposure on market group

exceptionType.name: APINGException
exceptionType.description: This exception is thrown when an operation fails

parameter.name: errorCode
parameter.description: the unique code for this error

value.name: TOO_MUCH_DATA
value.description: The operation requested too much data

value.name: INVALID_INPUT_DATA
value.description: Invalid input data

value.name: INVALID_SESSION_INFORMATION
value.description: The session token passed is invalid

value.name: NO_APP_KEY
value.description: An application key is required for this operation

value.name: NO_SESSION
value.description: A session token is required for this operation

value.name: UNEXPECTED_ERROR
value.description: An unexpected internal error occurred that prevented successful request processing.

value.name: INVALID_APP_KEY
value.description: The application key passed is invalid

value.name: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
value.description: There are too many pending requests

value.name: SERVICE_BUSY
value.description: The service is currently too busy to service this request

value.name: TIMEOUT_ERROR
value.description: Internal call to downstream service timed out

value.name: APP_KEY_CREATION_FAILED
value.description: The application key creation has failed

value.name: DUPLICATE_APP_NAME
value.description: The application name specified already exists

value.name: APP_CREATION_FAILED
value.description: The application name specified is too long

value.name: REQUEST_SIZE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT
value.description: The request has exceeded the maximum allowed size

value.name: ACCESS_DENIED
value.description: The access to this functionality is not allowed

value.name: INVALID_MARKET_GROUP
value.description: Provided market group id does not identify a known market group

value.name: EXPOSURE_LIMIT_NOT_EXIST
value.description: Unable to delete/update limit as it doesn't exist

value.name: MARKET_GROUP_NOT_BLOCKED
value.description: Unable to unblock market group after exposure limit breach, market group is not blocked

parameter.name: errorDetails
parameter.description: the stack trace of the error

value.name: COMPETITION
value.description: If not selected then the competition will not be returned with marketCatalogue

value.name: EVENT
value.description: If not selected then the event will not be returned with marketCatalogue

value.name: EVENT_TYPE
value.description: If not selected then the eventType will not be returned with marketCatalogue

value.name: MARKET_START_TIME
value.description: If not selected then the start time will not be returned with marketCatalogue

value.name: MARKET_DESCRIPTION
value.description: If not selected then the description will not be returned with marketCatalogue

value.name: RUNNER_DESCRIPTION
value.description: If not selected then the runners will not be returned with marketCatalogue

value.name: RUNNER_METADATA
value.description: If not selected then the runner metadata will not be returned with marketCatalogue. If selected then RUNNER_DESCRIPTION will also be returned regardless of whether it is included as a market projection.

value.name: EX_ALL_OFFERS
value.description: EX_ALL_OFFERS trumps EX_BEST_OFFERS if both settings are present

value.name: INACTIVE
value.description: Inactive Market

value.name: OPEN
value.description: Open Market

value.name: SUSPENDED
value.description: Suspended Market

value.name: CLOSED
value.description: Closed Market

value.name: ACTIVE
value.description: ACTIVE

value.name: WINNER
value.description: WINNER

value.name: LOSER
value.description: LOSER

value.name: REMOVED
value.description: REMOVED

value.name: PLACED
value.description: PLACED

value.name: BACK
value.description: To back a team, horse or outcome is to bet on the selection to win. For Line markets a Back bet refers to a SELL line. A SELL line will win if the outcome is LESS THAN the taken line (price).

value.name: LAY
value.description: To lay a team, horse, or outcome is to bet on the selection to lose. For line markets a Lay bet refers to a BUY line. A BUY line will win if the outcome is MORE THAN the taken line (price).

value.name: PENDING
value.description: An asynchronous order is yet to be processed. Once the bet has been processed by the exchange (including waiting for any in-play delay), the result will be reported and available on the Exchange Stream API and API NG. Not a valid search criteria on MarketFilter

value.name: EXECUTION_COMPLETE
value.description: An order that does not have any remaining unmatched portion.

value.name: EXECUTABLE
value.description: An order that has a remaining unmatched portion.

value.name: EXPIRED
value.description: The order is no longer available for execution due to its time in force constraint. In the case of FILL_OR_KILL orders, this means the order has been killed because it could not be filled to your specifications. Not a valid search criteria on MarketFilter

value.name: BY_BET
value.description: @Deprecated Use BY_PLACE_TIME instead. Order by placed time, then bet id.

value.name: BY_MARKET
value.description: Order by market id, then placed time, then bet id.

value.name: BY_PLACE_TIME
value.description: Order by placed time, then bet id. This is an alias of to be deprecated BY_BET.

value.name: BY_MATCH_TIME
value.description: Order by time of last matched fragment (if any), then placed time, then bet id. Filters out orders which have no matched date

value.name: BY_VOID_TIME
value.description: Order by time of last voided fragment (if any), then by last match time, then placed time, then bet id. Filters out orders which have not been voided.

value.name: BY_SETTLED_TIME
value.description: Order by time of last settled fragment (if any), then by last match time, then placed time, then bet id. Filters out orders which have not been settled.

value.name: EARLIEST_TO_LATEST
value.description: Order from earliest value to latest e.g. lowest betId is first in the results.

value.name: LATEST_TO_EARLIEST
value.description: Order from the latest value to the earliest e.g. highest betId is first in the results.

value.name: LIMIT
value.description: A normal exchange limit order for immediate execution

value.name: LIMIT_ON_CLOSE
value.description: Limit order for the auction (SP)

value.name: MARKET_ON_CLOSE
value.description: Market order for the auction (SP)

value.name: MINIMUM_TRADED
value.description: Minimum traded volume

value.name: MAXIMUM_TRADED
value.description: Maximum traded volume

value.name: MINIMUM_AVAILABLE
value.description: Minimum available to match

value.name: MAXIMUM_AVAILABLE
value.description: Maximum available to match

value.name: FIRST_TO_START
value.description: The closest markets based on their expected start time

value.name: LAST_TO_START
value.description: The most distant markets based on their expected start time

value.name: ODDS
value.description: Odds Market

value.name: LINE
value.description: Line markets operate at even-money odds of 2.0. However, price for these markets refers to the line positions available as defined by the markets min-max range and interval steps. Customers either Buy a line (LAY bet, winning if outcome is greater than the taken line (price)) or Sell a line (BACK bet, winning if outcome is less than the taken line (price)). If settled outcome equals the taken line, stake is returned.

value.name: RANGE
value.description: Range Market

value.name: ASIAN_HANDICAP_DOUBLE_LINE
value.description: Asian Handicap Market

value.name: ASIAN_HANDICAP_SINGLE_LINE
value.description: Asian Single Line Market

value.name: FIXED_ODDS
value.description: Sportsbook Odds Market. This type is deprecated and will be removed in future releases, when Sportsbook markets will be represented as ODDS market but with a different product type.

value.name: ERROR_IN_MATCHER
value.description: The matcher's not healthy

value.name: PROCESSED_WITH_ERRORS
value.description: The order itself has been accepted, but at least one (possibly all) actions have generated errors

value.name: BET_ACTION_ERROR
value.description: There is an error with an action that has caused the entire order to be rejected

value.name: INVALID_ACCOUNT_STATE
value.description: Order rejected due to the account's status (suspended, inactive, dup cards)

value.name: INVALID_WALLET_STATUS
value.description: Order rejected due to the account's wallet's status

value.name: INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS
value.description: Account has exceeded its exposure limit or available to bet limit

value.name: LOSS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
value.description: The account has exceed the self imposed loss limit

value.name: MARKET_SUSPENDED
value.description: Market is suspended

value.name: MARKET_NOT_OPEN_FOR_BETTING
value.description: Market is not open for betting, either inactive, suspended or closed

value.name: DUPLICATE_TRANSACTION
value.description: duplicate customer referece data submitted

value.name: INVALID_ORDER
value.description: Order cannot be accepted by the matcher due to the combination of actions. For example, bets being edited are not on the same market, or order includes both edits and placement

value.name: INVALID_MARKET_ID
value.description: Market doesn't exist

value.name: PERMISSION_DENIED
value.description: Business rules do not allow order to be placed

value.name: DUPLICATE_BETIDS
value.description: duplicate bet ids found

value.name: NO_ACTION_REQUIRED
value.description: Order hasn't been passed to matcher as system detected there will be no state change

value.name: SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
value.description: The requested service is unavailable

value.name: REJECTED_BY_REGULATOR
value.description: The regulator rejected the order

value.name: NO_CHASING
value.description: A specific error code that relates to Spanish Exchange markets only which indicates that the bet placed contravenes the Spanish regulatory rules relating to loss chasing.

value.name: REGULATOR_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE
value.description: The underlying regulator service is not available.

value.name: TOO_MANY_INSTRUCTIONS
value.description: The amount of orders exceeded the maximum amount allowed to be executed

value.name: INVALID_MARKET_VERSION
value.description: The supplied market version is invalid. Max length allowed for market version is 12.

value.name: EVENT_EXPOSURE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
value.description: Had the instructions been carried out, the account's self imposed event exposure limit would have been exceeded.

value.name: EVENT_MATCHED_EXPOSURE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
value.description: Had the instructions been carried out, the account's self imposed matched event exposure limit would have been exceeded.

value.name: EVENT_BLOCKED
value.description: Betting on this event is blocked due to exposure limit breach. unblockMarketGroup operation should be invoked to enable betting.

value.name: LAPSE
value.description: Lapse the order at turn-in-play

value.name: PERSIST
value.description: Persist the order to in-play

value.name: MARKET_ON_CLOSE
value.description: Put the order into the auction (SP) at turn-in-play

value.name: INVALID_BET_SIZE
value.description: Bet size is invalid for your currency or your regulator

value.name: INVALID_RUNNER
value.description: Runner does not exist, includes vacant traps in greyhound racing

value.name: BET_TAKEN_OR_LAPSED
value.description: Bet cannot be cancelled or modified as it has already been taken or has lapsed Includes attempts to cancel/modify market on close BSP bets and cancelling limit on close BSP bets

value.name: BET_IN_PROGRESS
value.description: No result was received from the matcher in a timeout configured for the system

value.name: RUNNER_REMOVED
value.description: Runner has been removed from the event

value.name: MARKET_NOT_OPEN_FOR_BETTING
value.description: Attempt to edit a bet on a market that has closed.

value.name: LOSS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
value.description: The action has caused the account to exceed the self imposed loss limit

value.name: MARKET_NOT_OPEN_FOR_BSP_BETTING
value.description: Market now closed to bsp betting. Turned in-play or has been reconciled

value.name: INVALID_PRICE_EDIT
value.description: Attempt to edit down the price of a bsp limit on close lay bet, or edit up the price of a limit on close back bet

value.name: INVALID_ODDS
value.description: Odds not on price ladder - either edit or placement

value.name: INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS
value.description: Insufficient funds available to cover the bet action. Either the exposure limit or available to bet limit would be exceeded

value.name: INVALID_PERSISTENCE_TYPE
value.description: Invalid persistence type for this market, e.g. KEEP for a non bsp market

value.name: ERROR_IN_MATCHER
value.description: A problem with the matcher prevented this action completing successfully

value.name: INVALID_BACK_LAY_COMBINATION
value.description: The order contains a back and a lay for the same runner at overlapping prices. This would guarantee a self match. This also applies to BSP limit on close bets

value.name: ERROR_IN_ORDER
value.description: The action failed because the parent order failed

value.name: INVALID_BID_TYPE
value.description: Bid type is mandatory

value.name: INVALID_BET_ID
value.description: Bet for id supplied has not been found

value.name: CANCELLED_NOT_PLACED
value.description: Bet cancelled but replacement bet was not placed

value.name: RELATED_ACTION_FAILED
value.description: Action failed due to the failure of a action on which this action is dependent

value.name: NO_ACTION_REQUIRED
value.description: the action does not result in any state change. eg changing a persistence to it's current value

value.name: INVALID_MIN_FILL_SIZE
value.description: The minFillSize must be greater than zero and less than or equal to the order's size. The minFillSize cannot be less than the minimum bet size for your currency

value.name: INVALID_CUSTOMER_ORDER_REF
value.description: The supplied customer order reference is too long.

value.name: TIME_IN_FORCE_CONFLICT
value.description: You may only specify a time in force on either the place request OR on individual limit order instructions (not both), since the implied behaviors are incompatible.

value.name: UNEXPECTED_PERSISTENCE_TYPE
value.description: You have specified a persistence type for a FILL_OR_KILL order, which is nonsensical because no umatched portion can remain after the order has been placed.

value.name: INVALID_ORDER_TYPE
value.description: You have specified a time in force of FILL_OR_KILL, but have included a non-LIMIT order type.

value.name: UNEXPECTED_MIN_FILL_SIZE
value.description: You have specified a minFillSize on a limit order, where the limit order's time in force is not FILL_OR_KILL. Using minFillSize is not supported where the time in force of the request (as opposed to an order) is FILL_OR_KILL.

value.name: INVALID_CUSTOMER_STRATEGY_REF
value.description: The supplied customer strategy reference is too long.

value.name: BET_LAPSED_PRICE_IMPROVEMENT_TOO_LARGE
value.description: Your bet is lapsed. There is better odds than requested available in the market, but your preferences don't allow the system to match your bet against better odds. Change your betting preferences to accept better odds if you don't want to receive this error.

value.name: STAKE
value.description: The volumes will be rolled up to the minimum value which is >= rollupLimit.

value.name: PAYOUT
value.description: The volumes will be rolled up to the minimum value where the payout( price * volume ) is >= rollupLimit. On a LINE market, volumes will be rolled up where payout( 2.0 * volume ) is >= rollupLimit.

value.name: MANAGED_LIABILITY
value.description: The volumes will be rolled up to the minimum value which is >= rollupLimit, until a lay price threshold. There after, the volumes will be rolled up to the minimum value such that the liability >= a minimum liability. Not supported as yet.

value.name: NONE
value.description: No rollup will be applied. However the volumes will be filtered by currency specific minimum stake unless overridden specifically for the channel.

value.name: EVENT_TYPE
value.description: A roll up of settled P&L, commission paid and number of bet orders, on a specified event type

value.name: EVENT
value.description: A roll up of settled P&L, commission paid and number of bet orders, on a specified event

value.name: MARKET
value.description: A roll up of settled P&L, commission paid and number of bet orders, on a specified market

value.name: RUNNER
value.description: A roll up of settled P&L and the number of bet orders, on a specified runner within a specified market

value.name: SIDE
value.description: An averaged roll up of settled P&L, and number of bets, on the specified side of a specified selection within a specified market, that are either settled or voided

value.name: BET
value.description: The P&L, commission paid, side and regulatory information etc, about each individual bet order

value.name: STRATEGY
value.description: A roll up of settled P&L and the number of bet orders, on a specified strategy across the Betfair Exchange

value.name: SETTLED
value.description: A matched bet that was settled normally

value.name: VOIDED
value.description: A matched bet that was subsequently voided by Betfair, before, during or after settlement

value.name: LAPSED
value.description: Unmatched bet that was cancelled by Betfair (for example at turn in play).

value.name: CANCELLED
value.description: Unmatched bet that was cancelled by an explicit customer action.

value.name: FILL_OR_KILL
value.description: Execute the transaction immediately and completely (filled to size or between minFillSize and size) or not at all (cancelled). For LINE markets Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP) functionality is disabled.

value.name: PAYOUT
value.description: The total payout requested on a LimitOrder. BetTargetType bets are invalid for LINE markets.

value.name: BACKERS_PROFIT
value.description: The payout requested minus the calculated size at which this LimitOrder is to be placed. BetTargetType bets are invalid for LINE markets.

value.name: CLASSIC
value.description: Price ladder increments traditionally used for Odds Markets.

value.name: FINEST
value.description: Price ladder with the finest available increment, traditionally used for Asian Handicap markets.

value.name: LINE_RANGE
value.description: Price ladder used for LINE markets. Refer to MarketLineRangeInfo for more details.

value.name: EVENT
value.description: An exchange event that has markets under it. EventId should be used as groupId parameter of MarketGroup type.

value.name: REJECT_BETS
value.description: Bet placements for market group will be rejected if they breach limit. For every bet placement exposure values will be compared against limit values.

value.name: STOP_BETTING
value.description:
Bet placements for market group will be rejected. Once the limit is breached account should use unblockMarketGroup to unlock market group.
Note that this type is only applicable to matched exposure limit

value.name: TEAR_DOWN_MARKET_GROUP
value.description:
Bet placements for market group will be rejected. Service will initiate a request to cancel unmatched bets under market group. Once the limit is breached account should use unblockMarketGroup to unlock market group.
Note that this type is only applicable to matched exposure limit
